video.title: Taboo
video.synopsis: An inside look at extreme rituals, beliefs and traditions, from controversial practices such as witchcraft and voodoo to blood sports and body art.

episodes.synopsis: Death generally has a bad reputation, but some savvy entrepreneurs choose to embrace it as a way to make money from misery.
episodes.title: Living with the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Strange behaviors born of rare medical conditions are difficult -- in some cases impossible -- for sufferers to control, leading to lives of stigma.
episodes.title: Strange Behavior

episodes.synopsis: A teen goes on a binge-drinking holiday that's sanctioned by his recovering alcoholic mother, who wants to teach him about the dangers of excess.
episodes.title: Booze

episodes.synopsis: Though it may be considered taboo in some countries, teen sex is accepted -- even encouraged -- in other cultures around the world.
episodes.title: Teen Sex

episodes.synopsis: Collectors of unusual artifacts go to extremes to amass rare finds, but sometimes their odd interests cross the line into obsession.
episodes.title: Extreme Collectors

episodes.synopsis: The world has vastly different definitions of "beauty," depending on the culture. But being deemed "ugly" is painful in any language.
episodes.title: Ugly

episodes.synopsis: Dirty jobs take on a disgusting new dimension in this exploration of unenviable occupations that involve dizzying levels of grime and filth.
episodes.title: Nasty Jobs

episodes.synopsis: Weddings are anything but typical for these most unusual lovebirds -- from a canine bride and groom to nine couples who get hitched in the nude.
episodes.title: Weird Weddings

episodes.synopsis: They say love works in mysterious ways -- and, sometimes, it takes the form of strange fetishes and unusual partnerships.
episodes.title: Strange Passions

episodes.synopsis: During raucous Labor Day festivities in Phoenix, local law enforcement and medical personnel encounter a dizzying degree of inebriation.
episodes.title: U.S. of Alcohol

episodes.synopsis: Some people will go to extremes to be unique, committing to painful and expensive procedures to set themselves apart from the crowd.
episodes.title: Extreme Bodies

episodes.synopsis: For some people, gender's not necessarily a given, including a loving couple who switched from husband and wife ... to wife and husband.
episodes.title: Changing Gender

episodes.synopsis: Collections of all shapes and sizes comprise odd artifacts and freaky findings, including a cache of foot photographs that tops 5 million.
episodes.title: Weird Collections

episodes.synopsis: They say there's someone out there for everyone, but some of these couples' shared passions take that saying to the extreme.
episodes.title: Private Passions

episodes.synopsis: Childhood is typically a time of innocence. But for some, growing up means grappling with questions most kids don't have to answer.
episodes.title: Old Enough?

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to rare syndromes and incurable medical conditions, some people are born with differences that make it impossible to blend in.
episodes.title: Strange Syndromes

episodes.synopsis: People around the world deal with the deaths of their loved ones in a variety of ways -- some far more unsettling than others.
episodes.title: Bizarre Burials

episodes.synopsis: Exorcisms aren't just for horror movies. In some parts of the world, people believe in the power of demonic spirits and actively work to expel them.
episodes.title: Devils and Demons
